name: Derrick Michael ALLEN, Sr., petitioner, v. UNITED STATES.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
Derrick Michael ALLEN, Sr., petitioner,
v.
UNITED STATES.
attorneys: On petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit. Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis and petition for writ of certiorari granted. Judgment vacated, and case remanded to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit for further consideration in light of Rehaif v. United States , 588 U.S. ----, 139 S.Ct. 2191, --- L.E.2d ---- (2019).
casebody.head_matter:
Derrick Michael ALLEN, Sr., petitioner,
v.
UNITED STATES.
No. 18-7123.
Supreme Court of the United States
June 28, 2019.
On petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit. Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis and petition for writ of certiorari granted. Judgment vacated, and case remanded to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit for further consideration in light of Rehaif v. United States , 588 U.S. ----, 139 S.Ct. 2191, --- L.E.2d ---- (2019).
